translation.en: What if we can never go back to this? This is-- this is good. This works.

translation.en: What if, what if, what if, what if…
What if it works well? What if it-- What if it works amazing?

translation.en: What if it just is the beginning of, like…
this beautiful thing that we create?
You know, like, what if that?
What if Ro gets to be with both of her parents… together?

translation.en: I'm scared. I'm sorry.
I can't. I'm-- I don't-- I can't risk this.

translation.en: I don't wanna risk this.
Just for Ro. I'm sorry. I can't.

translation.en: That's…
I get it. Um…
Just because I'm not ready doesn't mean you can't be ready.

translation.en: Enjoy this space, you know?
-Yeah. I mean… -Go start dating!
-Dating… -Or not. I don't know.
translation.zh: -约会… -或者不约会 我不晓得

translation.en: If you want.
Okay.
Okay.
…'cause she is so cute!
Come here, baby girl!
-Oh, big burp! Big burp! -Oh, go to Momma.
I miss you.
[Nat] I miss you.
-I miss you too. A lot. -Mm-hmm.
-Oh! Wait, I remember this. -[sighs]
You were always the most organized person in the world with this thing.
translation.zh: 我没见过比你更有条理的人

translation.en: They're just doodles. [squeakily] They're just doodles!
Just doodles?
No, these are…
translation.zh: （罗茜睡眠日志） 不 这些记录…

translation.en: These are so good. Who is this guy?
So, when Ro was first born, she had her days and nights mixed up.
translation.zh: 小茜刚出生的时候日夜颠倒

translation.en: So we started calling her our little night owl. Boop!
Beep!
And Gabe does this little voice with her where he makes her say things as the owl,
translation.zh: 加布捏着嗓子和她说话 教她学猫头鹰叫

translation.en: and it's… it's just the cutest and cringiest thing you've ever seen.
translation.zh: 可爱极了 同时又诡异极了

translation.en: [squeakily] Isn't that right?
So Gabe got his own place?
translation.zh: 听说加布自己搬出去住了？

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -How's that been?
Um, it sucks.
Um, he offered to stay, but I actually told him to go and get his own space and bed
translation.zh: 他提议留下 但我叫他自己出去住

translation.en: -and to put some women in it. -[Rosie chuckles]
-Wait, it was-- it was your idea? -Yeah, it was mine.
translation.zh: -等等 那是你的主意？ -对 是我的

translation.en: -Wh-- why would you do that? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -你为什么要那么做？ -我不知道

translation.en: I was overwhelmed.
I started seeing him as, like, this man for the first time,
translation.zh: 因为我开始对他有了不一样的感觉

translation.en: -and it was scary and overwhelming. -[babbling]
translation.zh: 我吓坏了 不知道该怎么办才好

translation.en: And, um…
And I screwed up! I screwed up!
-[Nat] You gotta keep goin'. -Okay!
-Did you get one? Can I have one? -Yes, you can have one.
translation.zh: -你拿到了吗？我可以吃一个吗？ -是的 你可以吃一个

translation.en: [Jake] Oh! That's… that's my poster.
[laughs] That's my name!
Stand by the poster.
[Nat] Look. Wanna go see that?
-Are you gonna go see that? -[Rosie] Yes.
translation.zh: （鸭-鸭-山羊！） -我们要去看看吗？ -好

translation.en: -Don't do it. -I don't have a technique, but I could…
translation.zh: -别这样 -我没有技巧 但我可以…

translation.en: I thought you were gonna say, "I don't have a tongue." [laughs]
translation.zh: 我以为你会说：“我没有舌头”

translation.en: I'm gonna be the lead producer on the Sable Island project.
translation.zh: 我当上黑貂岛项目的首席制作人了

translation.en: -You are? -Yeah. It's never gonna happen.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -对 不过项目不可能启动

translation.en: -It won't get funded. -Don't say that.
-It's cool that it's my project. -It is. Oh my God! That's amazing!
translation.zh: -但我有自己的项目了 真好 -没错 我的天！太棒了！

translation.en: And I was thinking maybe we could look for a place together.
translation.zh: 我想我们可以一起找个地方住

translation.en: You and me move… Get a place together?
-You know… Yeah, unless you don't want to. -No, no, I--
translation.zh: -对 除非你不想 -不 我想

translation.en: I want to. You wanna-- you want to?
-Then let's do it. -I think we should do it.
translation.zh: -那就这么办吧 -我觉得我们应该这么做

translation.en: I'll start looking.
This-- I can't-- This thing's defective. I--
translation.zh: 这个…我不能…这东西坏了

translation.en: Seriously?
[Rick] Oh, oh! I'm just trying to get the mud off your foot.
translation.zh: 我只是想把你脚上的泥巴弄掉

translation.en: -I'm sorry! -[kids laughing]
[Rick] She's almost as cute as Natalie was as a baby.
translation.zh: 她跟小宝宝时的娜塔莉几乎一样可爱

translation.en: [Tina] We made that baby.
translation.zh: 那个宝宝是我们造出来的

translation.en: I mean, through one other baby.
translation.zh: 我是说 通过另一个宝宝

translation.en: -I get it. I follow. -Yeah. Okay.
[Rick] How you doin', buddy?
[Gabe] Pretty good.
-Hey, Gabe! -All right…
-Hey. -Oh, hey!
Who's that?
I think that's Miranda. His new lady.
translation.zh: 应该是米兰达吧 他的新欢

translation.en: -No kiddin'. -She's cute.
-[Rick] That's nice she's here. -[Tina] Yeah.
-Good for him. -I know.
-[Gabe] Nothing… -Hi! Hi.
Can I talk to you inside for two seconds?
What's up?
I just didn't know that Miranda was gonna be here today.
translation.zh: 我不知道米兰达今天会来

translation.en: You-- you told me to bring a guest.
Yeah, but I just don't know her,
and now she's at my parents' house…
And?
Now she knows that I live with my parents, and that just is weird to me.
translation.zh: 现在她知道我跟父母住在一起 我会感觉不自在

translation.en: Why wouldn't she?
She's in my life. And I want her to be in ours.
translation.zh: 她是我生活的一部分 我想让她加入我们的生活

translation.en: Get to know Rosie.
But, um… I do have to thank you, though.
For what?
Well, if it wasn't for you…
telling me to get out there and start dating again, I…
I wouldn't have met her, so thank you.
translation.zh: 我就不会遇见她 所以 谢谢你

translation.en: Well, then, you're welcome.
-[door closes] -[woman] Oh, that was fun.
Yeah.
-[Cara] Okay, bye. -[woman laughs]
-Right up. Yep. -Okay. See ya.
Bye.
[Jake] Well, well, well.
Nice.
[Cara] Yeah. You know?
Things do be moving fast around here. Gotta keep up. Whew! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这边的事情进展得很快 你得跟上

translation.en: I was gonna eat that.
-It's okay. We have more. -Do you?
translation.zh: -没关系 我们还有更多的 -是吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, in the kitchen. -I'll get some. Want somethin'?
translation.zh: -在厨房里 -我去拿 你想要什么吗？

translation.en: No, I'm okay. Oh, wait! But wait, hold on. I wanna show you something.
translation.zh: 不用 等等！我想给你看点东西

translation.en: I'm gonna show Lucy my portfolio,
translation.zh: 我要给露西看我的作品集

translation.en: and I want your brutally honest opinion, please.
translation.zh: 所以我需要你毫无保留地 告诉我你的真实看法

translation.en: -Hell, yes. -Take a look.
You just swipe.
[Jake] Wow.
These are great.
-Yeah? -When are you gonna show her?
-Soon. Sometime soon. -Uh-huh.
You should 'cause you're gonna wrap soon, right?
translation.zh: 你应该赶快 你这个项目就要结束了

translation.en: -Yeah? -She'll be staffing up her next project.
translation.zh: -所以呢？ -她会为下一个项目安排人手

translation.en: -You want her thinkin' of you. -True.
I don't know. It's hard to, like, sell myself in that way.
translation.zh: 可我不擅长用那种方式推销自己

translation.en: You have to ask for what you want.
translation.zh: 你得主动争取想要的东西

translation.en: Okay?
Lucy?
Lucy?
Yes. Yes.
-[switches music off] -Sorry.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -这是用于片尾的新歌吗？

translation.en: -Is this the new song for the end? -It is, it is. Do you like it?
translation.zh: -抱歉 -这是用于片尾的新歌吗？ 是的 你喜欢吗？

translation.en: -I do. -You sure?
-Mm-hmm. -Amazing.
Well, please tell the team that we are locking the final sequence!

translation.en: -Yay! -Yes!
Now that you maybe have a spare moment, would you be able to look at my portfolio?

translation.en: If you have the time--
Absolutely. I would love to. Just please send me the link.
translation.zh: 当然没问题 我很乐意 请把链接发给我

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you.
But she hasn't even opened the link.
[Jake] You gotta give people a month before you follow up.

translation.en: -A month? -Yes, a month.
What the hell are people doing?
Oh, did you see the, um… the Highland Park one?

translation.en: It has a cute tile bathroom, and it's, like, a walk away from Donut Friend, which is… nice.

translation.en: Did you-- What?
We got the funding for the Sable Island project.
translation.zh: 黑貂岛项目的资金到位了

translation.en: Okay.
I'm gonna have to go to Nova Scotia.
-Oh, well-- -For six months.
For six months?
-Or maybe a year. -Oh my God.
Yeah.
-Ah, it's just bad timing. -Yeah.
So we're not looking for an apartment, then?

translation.en: I mean…
we can still.
-I just-- -You won't…
You just won't be living in it.
Yeah.
-It's okay. Hey. It's okay. It's fi-- -I'm sorry.

translation.en: Don't be sorry.
This is so great for you.
We'll make it work. I'm not worried about it.

translation.en: Okay.
-Let's get ice cream. -Okay.
-Bye, babe. -Bye.
Okay. I'll see you soon, okay? Mwah!

translation.en: Go ahead.
Have fun while I'm away.

translation.en: Let's go.
-[gasps] Hi! -[Cara] Hey!
You made it!
-Yeah, only took me four years. -Mm!

translation.en: -I got the invite to Nicole's baby shower. -Yeah.

translation.en: -Right. Well, if you're going, I'll go. -Mm! I'll get to see you again!

translation.en: Yeah! [laughs]
I guess.
Thank you for having me here.
Yeah! Course!
Yeah, but…
I needed to get away, and I'm just thankful to be here.

translation.en: I love having you here. And literally, any time, by the way.

translation.en: You know. My couch is your couch. This is your home too, okay?

translation.en: Thank you. I'm gonna get some juice. Do you want any?

translation.en: No, I'm okay.
Be right back.
Okay.
-Oh shit. -Oh God. I am so sorry.
No, it's okay. Um…
-It's fine. No, don't worry about it. -Aah… There.
They're old. It's fine. Seriously, it's fine.

translation.en: You shouldn't have said that. I was gonna insist on buying you a round of drinks.

translation.en: Oh, well, then, you know, they're actually vintage and priceless.
translation.zh: 这样的话 其实这是古董 无价之宝

translation.en: -I love it a lot. So… -Yeah. That's what I thought. I-- I deeply apologize, and I owe you a round of drinks.
translation.zh: 我也是这么想的 我深表歉意 我欠你一杯酒

translation.en: -You actually don't have to. -No, I'm going to.
-Oh, okay. -And sorry again.
Thank you.
I would love to grab that table some…
I really cannot imagine what my life would have been like here.
translation.zh: 我无法想象我在这里的生活会是怎样

translation.en: -What? -Mm-mm.
-That's a lie. -No, 'cause it's very overwhelming.

translation.en: Whatever. Wasn't meant to be.
translation.zh: 随便吧 反正这也不是你的命中注定

translation.en: You were supposed to go and have your gorgeous family.
translation.zh: 你注定是要跟你可爱的家人在一起的

translation.en: Yeah.
I said I found a really good place that's near here.
translation.zh: 我说我在附近 找到了一个很好的地方

translation.en: Aah, sorry, I can't…
Hello?
Um, I miss you.
I-- I miss you too! I miss you!
I'm telling you about the apartment. I emailed you. It's--
translation.zh: 我在跟你说公寓的事 我发邮件给你了 是…

translation.en: I can't hear what you're saying. Sorry.
translation.zh: 我听不到你在说什么 抱歉

translation.en: -It has a really cute studio space for me. -[voice breaking up]
translation.zh: -那里有个工作室空间很适合我 -我好冷

translation.en: Can you hear me?
Hey. Uh, Blue Bottle?
What?
Uh… Coffee?
Oh, yeah, yeah. Thank you.
Hi, good morning!
[Rosie] Mommy!
How are you, baby?
Good.
Good. I miss you.
Can I speak to your dad for a second?
Daddy's not here.
No? Where is he?
Daddy said Jessie's in charge.
translation.zh: 爸爸说这里由杰西负责

translation.en: Who's Jessie?
[giggles] She's a girl.
Has she been with you all night?
Yeah, she slept on the couch.
I miss you. When are you coming home?
translation.zh: 我想你 你什么时候回家？

translation.en: I'm gonna come. I'm gonna come, gonna see you soon. Okay?
translation.zh: 我就要来了 我很快就会见到你 好吧？

translation.en: Okay. Love you. I'll see you soon.
translation.zh: 好 爱你 我们很快就再见了

translation.en: -Bye, Mommy. -Bye, Ro.
translation.zh: -妈咪 拜拜 -再见 小茜

translation.en: What the fuck?
Yo, this is Gabe. Leave your message.
translation.zh: 喂 我是加布 请留言

translation.en: -[beeps] -Gabe, call me back right now.
translation.zh: 加布 马上给我回电话

translation.en: Hey. Morning. [sighing] Hi.
Should we maybe get some brunch before we go to the beach?
translation.zh: 我们去海滩之前 吃点早午餐吧？

translation.en: I think I have to go. Home. I think I have to go home.
translation.zh: 我想我得走了 回家 我得回家了

translation.en: Like…
-Uh-- Like Texas? -Yeah.
-You just got here. -No, I know. Uh…
Rosie just called me. She doesn't know where Gabe is.
translation.zh: 罗茜刚才打电话给我 她不知道加布在哪里

translation.en: I don't know where Gabe is. He's not answering his phone.
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么办 他不接电话

translation.en: She's with a sitter. She was with a sitter all night.
Oh, she's with-- she's with a sitter?
Yeah, but I don't know her. I don't know who this person is.
translation.zh: 对 但我不认识她 我不知道这个人是谁

translation.en: Do you have to go home, though?
translation.zh: 你非得回家吗？我刚请了一周假…

translation.en: -I mean, I just took the week off work-- -I know. Yeah. No. I know.
translation.zh: 你非得回家吗？我刚请了一周假… 我知道 对 我知道

translation.en: -Like, we were gonna go and brunch and-- -Rosie-- Rosie just takes precedence over…
translation.zh: 我们本来要去吃早午餐 然后… 罗茜比早午餐

translation.en: brunch and going to the beach, you know?
Yeah, yeah. Of course. Yeah. [chuckles]
-Hey. -[girlfriend] Some coffee?
Yeah, thanks.
[girlfriend] Wanna go to the beach?
-[Cara] Yeah. -Yeah.
[girlfriend] Do you wanna get brunch?
-[Lucy] Natalie? -Yeah?
In my office, please.
Yeah.
Yes?
Have a seat.
I'm gonna be really honest.
Okay.
There's definitely some skill there. Nice perspective, beautiful shading…
translation.zh: 技巧不错 透视出色 阴影很漂亮…

translation.en: Thank you.
…but it, um… it feels a little derivative.
Oh, actually, a lot derivative.
translation.zh: 其实 是严重缺乏原创性

translation.en: Okay, what do you mean? Like you use some algorithm.
translation.zh: -好 你是什么意思？ -就好像你在使用某种算法

translation.en: You see, you're smart.
You've done the work. That's a good thing. That is a great thing.
translation.zh: 你完成了这作品 这是好事 很好

translation.en: But it seems to me that you are drawing what you think you should draw,
translation.zh: 但在我看来 你是在参照前人的作品

translation.en: based on what already is.
translation.zh: 画出你认为应该画的东西

translation.en: You see, I see Barbera.
I see Chuck Jones.
I see Tissa David.
I even see a bit of myself, but I don't see you in any of this.
translation.zh: 我甚至在里面看到了一些我的影子 但我完全看不到你的个性

translation.en: Okay.
Maybe…
maybe you could help me find… my voice?
translation.zh: 你可以帮我找到我的声音？

translation.en: "Help you find your voice."
You know, I was an assistant at Pixar for many years.
translation.zh: 我在皮克斯当了很多年的助理

translation.en: And I learned a lot. It was great.
translation.zh: 我学到了很多 那很棒

translation.en: But the biggest lesson that I learned
translation.zh: 但我学到的最大的教训是

translation.en: was that I was spending so much time helping other people find their voice
translation.zh: 我花了太多时间帮人找到他们的声音

translation.en: that I had no time to find my own.
translation.zh: 而我自己却没时间找到自己的声音

translation.en: And one day, I just quit,
translation.zh: 有一天 我干脆辞职了

translation.en: and I took a shit job that I didn't have to take home,
translation.zh: 然后我找了一份烂工作 但它不用加班

translation.en: and all I did every single day was find my voice.
translation.zh: 我每天只专注于寻找自己的声音

translation.en: I didn't have a mentor. I didn't have any help.
translation.zh: 我没有导师 我没有任何帮助

translation.en: Do you understand?
Are you trying to tell me I should quit?
I'm telling you that everybody has that moment in their life
translation.zh: 我说的是 每个人的人生中 都会遇到某个时刻

translation.en: where they have to decide what's most important to them.
translation.zh: 你需要决定什么对自己是最重要的

translation.en: This.
This is… what's most important to me.
translation.zh: 寻找自己的声音对我来说最重要

translation.en: Then this is the moment.
[Jake] She fired you?
No, but she basically told me that all my work was unoriginal, uninspired,
translation.zh: 没有 但基本上她的意思就是 我的作品缺乏创意和灵感

translation.en: and that I was copying other artists, and that I should basically just quit.
translation.zh: 我是在抄袭别的艺术家 我该辞职

translation.en: Are you listening to me?
Yes. Yeah. I'm-- I'm sorry, Nat. That's--
translation.zh: 在 对不起 小娜

translation.en: -[sniffles] -That's really unfair.
Okay, uh, what I'll do is, when I-- when I get a second, I'll, um, call Jenny.
translation.zh: 好吧 等我有空我会打给珍妮

translation.en: -She had some leads for me… -No! Please don't call Jenny.
translation.zh: -她给过我工作的信息… -不！拜托别打给珍妮

translation.en: I don't want you to help.
I'm just trying to vent to you.
I just wanna talk to my boyfriend and feel comforted.
translation.zh: 我只想跟我男朋友聊聊 寻求慰藉

translation.en: I just wanna connect with you,
because I feel like that doesn't really happen very much these days.
translation.zh: 因为我觉得我们最近联系太少

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Yeah. Um…
I've created space for you. I've sent you apartment listings.
translation.zh: 我给了你足够的个人空间 我给你发了公寓清单

translation.en: You don't even look at them. You don't even answer me.
translation.zh: 你根本没看 你都不回我

translation.en: I'm trying to create a home and a life with you. I wish you would…
translation.zh: 我想和你一起成家 一起生活 我希望你能把我也加入你的计划

translation.en: I wish you would want to include me in your plan.
translation.zh: 我希望你能把我也加入你的计划

translation.en: Nat, I'm here on the phone with you. I'm talking to you. I…
translation.zh: 小娜 我在和你通电话 我在跟你说话 我…

translation.en: [groans] It is a ridiculous day here,
and I'm freezing my ass off,

Where it all started.

that you would be there for me.
